sourcesContent: import { Link as RouterLink } from 'react-router-dom'; // material-ui import { useTheme } from '@mui/material/styles'; import { Box, Button, Container, Grid, Link, Typography } from '@mui/material'; // third party import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; // project import import MainCard from 'components/MainCard'; // assets import { SendOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons'; import imgdemo1 from 'assets/images/landing/img-demo1.jpg'; import imgdemo2 from 'assets/images/landing/img-demo2.jpg'; import imgdemo3 from 'assets/images/landing/img-demo3.jpg'; import AnimateButton from 'components/@extended/AnimateButton'; // ==============================|| LANDING - DEMO PAGE ||============================== // const DemoBlock = () => { const theme = useTheme(); return ( Mantis for All Complete Combo Wheather you are developer or designer, Mantis serve the need of all - No matter you are novice or expert Design Source File Check the live preview of Mantis figma design file. Figma file included in Plus and Extended License only. Components Check the all components of Mantis in single place with search feature for easing your development while working. Documentation From Quick start to detailed installation with super easy navigation for find out solution of your queries with complex documentation guide. ); }; export default DemoBlock;
